quoteText: Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration.
You can observe a lot just by watching.
A house divided against itself cannot stand.
Difficulties increase the nearer we get to the goal.
Fate is in your hands and no one elses
Be the chief but never the lord.
Nothing happens unless first we dream.
Well begun is half done.
Life is a learning experience, only if you learn.
Self-complacency is fatal to progress.
Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
What you give is what you get.
We can only learn to love by loving.
Life is change. Growth is optional. Choose wisely.
You'll see it when you believe it.
Today is the tomorrow we worried about yesterday.
It's easier to see the mistakes on someone else's paper.
Every man dies. Not every man really lives.
To lead people walk behind them.
Having nothing, nothing can he lose.
Trouble is only opportunity in work clothes.
A rolling stone gathers no moss.
Ideas are the beginning points of all fortunes.
Everything in life is luck.
Doing nothing is better than being busy doing nothing.
Trust yourself. You know more than you think you do.
Money was never a big motivation for me, except as a way to keep score. The real excitement is playing the game.
You can only grow if you're willing to feel awkward and uncomfortable when you try something new.
To free us from the expectations of others, to give us back to ourselves ó there lies the great, singular power of self-respect.
Cherish your visions and your dreams as they are the children of your soul, the blueprints of your ultimate achievements.
It is more important to know where you are going than to get there quickly. Do not mistake activity for achievement.

When you don't know what you believe, everything becomes an argument. Everything is debatable. But when you stand for something, decisions are obvious.
Why worry about things you canít control when you can keep yourself busy controlling the things that depend on you?
There are things so deep and complex that only intuition can reach it in our stage of development as human beings.
The greatest pleasure I know is to do a good action by stealth, and to have it found out by accident.
Intuition is the supra-logic that cuts out all the routine processes of thought and leaps straight from the problem to the answer.
All difficult things have their origin in that which is easy, and great things in that which is small.
The thing always happens that you really believe in; and the belief in a thing makes it happen.
A true friend is the most precious of all possessions and the one we take the least thought about acquiring.
There is only one way to happiness and that is to cease worrying about things which are beyond the power of our will.
The only thing to do with good advice is to pass it on. It is never of any use to oneself.
Appreciation can make a day, even change a life. Your willingness to put it into words is all that is necessary.
One secret of success in life is for a man to be ready for his opportunity when it comes.
One must be fond of people and trust them if one is not to make a mess of life.
There are two primary choices in life: to accept conditions as they exist, or accept the responsibility for changing them.
Every sixty seconds you spend angry, upset or mad, is a full minute of happiness youíll never get back.
A little more persistence, a little more effort, and what seemed hopeless failure may turn to glorious success.
There is only one way to happiness and that is to cease worrying about things which are beyond the power of our will.
This world, after all our science and sciences, is still a miracle; wonderful, inscrutable, magical and more, to whosoever will think of it.
Every great mistake has a halfway moment, a split second when it can be recalled and perhaps remedied.
You can adopt the attitude there is nothing you can do, or you can see the challenge as your call to action.
The happiness of a man in this life does not consist in the absence but in the mastery of his passions.
Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed people can change the world. Indeed. It is the only thing that ever has.
Let your hook always be cast; in the pool where you least expect it, there will be a fish.
The person born with a talent they are meant to use will find their greatest happiness in using it.
You get peace of mind not by thinking about it or imagining it, but by quietening and relaxing the restless mind.
There is only one way to happiness and that is to cease worrying about things which are beyond the power of our will.
If we have a positive mental attitude, then even when surrounded by hostility, we shall not lack inner peace.
Your friends will know you better in the first minute you meet than your acquaintances will know you in a thousand years.
It is the greatest of all mistakes to do nothing because you can only do little ó do what you can.
When you are content to be simply yourself and don't compare or compete, everybody will respect you.
When you begin to touch your heart or let your heart be touched, you begin to discover that it's bottomless.
The thing always happens that you really believe in; and the belief in a thing makes it happen.
If you love someone, set them free. If they come back they're yours; if they don't they never were.
The road leading to a goal does not separate you from the destination; it is essentially a part of it.
Wisdom is knowing what to do next; Skill is knowing how ot do it, and Virtue is doing it.
Make the best use of what is in your power, and take the rest as it happens.
Snowflakes are one of natures most fragile things, but just look what they can do when they stick together.
Something opens our wings. Something makes boredom and hurt disappear. Someone fills the cup in front of us: We taste only sacredness.
Why worry about things you canít control when you can keep yourself busy controlling the things that depend on you?
When one tugs at a single thing in nature, he finds it attached to the rest of the world.
I'm a great believer in luck and I find the harder I work, the more I have of it.
Bad things are not the worst things that can happen to us. Nothing is the worst thing that can happen to us!
Wisdom is knowing what to do next; Skill is knowing how ot do it, and Virtue is doing it.
You can only grow if you're willing to feel awkward and uncomfortable when you try something new.
No valid plans for the future can be made by those who have no capacity for living now.
The aim of life is self-development. To realize ones nature perfectly ó that is what each of us is here for.
Great indeed is the sublimity of the Creative, to which all beings owe their beginning and which permeates all heaven.
One does not discover new lands without consenting to lose sight of the shore for a very long time.
To accomplish great things, we must not only act, but also dream; not only plan, but also believe.
The first requisite for success is the ability to apply your physical and mental energies to one problem incessantly without growing weary.
If we could learn to like ourselves, even a little, maybe our cruelties and angers might melt away.
We are either progressing or retrograding all the while. There is no such thing as remaining stationary in this life.
